actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for the approval by concurrent resolution of the Congress of all proposed changes in postal rates and classes before such changes become effective, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides that proposed ajdustments in postal rates and classes shall not take effect unless, within ninety calendar days after submission thereof to the Congress for study, the Congress has passed a concurrent resolution which specifically approves all of such proposed adjustments.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the approval by concurrent resolution of the Congress of all proposed changes in postal rates and classes before such changes become effective, and for other purposes.
